argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-ov | |- ( V Edges E ) = ( Edges ` <. V , E >. ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( V USGrph E <-> <. V , E >. e. USGrph ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_biimpi | |- ( V USGrph E -> <. V , E >. e. USGrph ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> <. V , E >. e. USGrph ) |
| 5 |  | #P_usgrav | |- ( V USGrph E -> ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_gordopval | |- ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) -> ( GrOrder ` <. V , E >. ) = ( # ` V ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( V USGrph E -> ( GrOrder ` <. V , E >. ) = ( # ` V ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> ( GrOrder ` <. V , E >. ) = ( # ` V ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> ( # ` V ) = 0 ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> ( GrOrder ` <. V , E >. ) = 0 ) |
| 11 |  | #P_usgo0fis | |- ( ( <. V , E >. e. USGrph /\ ( GrOrder ` <. V , E >. ) = 0 ) -> ( Edges ` <. V , E >. ) e. Fin ) |
| 12 | 4, 10, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> ( Edges ` <. V , E >. ) e. Fin ) |
| 13 | 1, 12 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> ( V Edges E ) e. Fin ) |
| 14 |  | #P_usgedgffibi | |- ( V USGrph E -> ( E e. Fin <-> ( V Edges E ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> ( E e. Fin <-> ( V Edges E ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( # ` V ) = 0 ) -> E e. Fin ) |
\
 Alternate version of ~ usgrafisbase , not depending on ~ usgrafisindb0 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 10-Jan-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
